performance.title: Fast Development & Runtime
performance.description: Built on Astro's MPA architecture with partial hydration and Bun as an ultra-fast JavaScript runtime for optimal performance.

components.title: Modern UI Components
components.description: Combines shadcn/ui with Tailwind CSS and React for beautiful, accessible, and fully customizable interfaces.

multilingual.title: Internationalization Ready
multilingual.description: Dynamic i18n system with support for multiple languages through a modular JSON-based translation architecture.

developer.title: Developer Experience
developer.description: TypeScript integration and organized project structure for enhanced developer productivity.

tech.title: Complete Modern Stack
tech.description: Ready-to-use integration of Astro, React, Bun, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for rapid application development.

themes.title: Light/Dark Themes
themes.description: Built-in theme system with automatic detection of user preferences and persistent settings.

deployment.description: Optimized configuration for Vercel with SSR support, providing a fast and reliable production environment.
